creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Richard Dickes
description: four lines of largely written characters; three small characters (signature?) with square intaglio stamp LLC; no fan crease marks; mounted on paper with translucent sheen over the top; displayed behind brown mat
markings: small square intaglio seal LLC; on mount: LLC, in pencil: [D 5578]; on mount, LRC, in pencil: [28], pencil mark URC; on back of mount, LRQ, in pencil: [14 / 29/339]; on LRC of base mount, in pencil, various markings
title: Wine and Fish
